Back to Johannes Brahms

Johannes Brahms

Papillon, Anh. III/5

c. 1854–1855

This is an arrangement of the opening to the seventh piece from Robert Schumann’s Papillons (op. 2).

Recommended editions

  • Neue-Brahms Ausgabe (Henle) · III/7 · HN 6009 · Klavierwerke ohne Opuszahl · ed. Camilla Cai

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5
